name: Quest for the Missing Piece
description:
This is my first game made with Unity.
Made for the LEGO Ideas x Unity game jam/contest.

PLEASE NOTE:

If the game lags too much, try turning off shadows in the options.

There is a bug that sometimes happens due to lag where the puzzle becomes unsolvable. If you think you have the right answer, but the gate isn’t opening, try restarting the level.
